nature_language: [当前位置广州,目标位置深圳,旅行人数3,旅行天数2] 我们一行三人要从广州去到深圳玩两天，想去繁华的街区逛逛，尽可能减少麻烦的交通，总消费尽可能少
nature_language_en: [Current location: Guangzhou, Destination: Shenzhen, Number of travelers: 3, Number of travel days: 2] Our group of three plans to travel from Guangzhou to Shenzhen for two days. We want to explore bustling neighborhoods, minimize inconvenient transportation, and keep the total expenses as low as possible.
